sentences.en: After this, the paper puts the correspondent strategies of sustainable development.
sentences.cn: 本文在分析存在问题的同时, 提出了相应的区域可持续发展对策.

sentences.en: Competitive Advantage: does the company a sustainable competitive advantage?
sentences.cn: 竞争优势: 公司是否有可持续的竞争优势?

sentences.en: Cycling is a totally sustainable form of transport.
sentences.cn: 骑自行车是一种绝对环保的交通方式。

sentences.en: environmentally sustainable development
sentences.cn: 生态环境的可持续发展

sentences.en: I do not believe these astonishing trends are desirable or sustainable.
sentences.cn: 我认为,这些惊人的趋势既不理想也不可持续.

sentences.en: Real estate: The real estate sector saw sustainable and rapid development.
sentences.cn: 房地产业: 房地产业持续快速发展.

sentences.en: Regarding this corner, article proposed some sustainable strategies on solving the questions.
sentences.cn: 对此困境, 本文提出了解决问题的具体策略.

sentences.en: Rockwell Automation defines sustainable production as cleaner, safer more energy - efficient operations.
sentences.cn: 罗克韦尔自动化将可持续生产定义为更清洁 、 更安全、更节能的生产.

sentences.en: Sustainable development of circular economy is an inevitable choice.
sentences.cn: 循环经济是可持续发展的必然选择.

sentences.en: The creation of an efficient and sustainable transport system is critical to the long-term future of London.
sentences.cn: 建立一套高效稳定的交通体系对伦敦的长远发展意义重大。

sentences.en: The government should do more to promote sustainable agriculture.
sentences.cn: 政府应该做更多工作来推动可持续农业的发展。

sentences.en: The party is promising low inflation and sustainable economic growth.
sentences.cn: 该政党承诺将保持低通胀，促进经济的可持续增长。

sentences.en: The sustainable development of agriculture and agriculture operations are closely related.
sentences.cn: 农业的持续发展,与农业的经营方式有着密切的关系.

sentences.en: the sustainable use of rainforest resources
sentences.cn: 雨林资源的可持续利用

sentences.en: The world's present external imbalances are neither desirable nor sustainable.
sentences.cn: 世界目前的对外经济失衡不仅让人不快,而且也不会长久.

sentences.en: Therefore , sustainable development should become the direction to Honghu wetland ecotourism.
sentences.cn: 洪湖湿地生态也面临一些生态问题,影响了湿地生态旅游的开展.

sentences.en: This confidence will, in turn, contribute to a sustainable recovery.
sentences.cn: 这种信赖将进而推动经济的可持续复苏.

sentences.en: This is another high - tech way to sustainable development aspirations.
sentences.cn: 本文也是 高新技术 可持续发展问题的另一种出路的诉求.

sentences.en: This whole process offers a sustainable and non - intrusive way to decontaminate land.
sentences.cn: 整个过程提供了一种可持续性、 非 侵扰性的土地净化方式.

sentences.en: Try to buy wood that you know has come from a sustainable source.
sentences.cn: 尽量购买来自可持续发展林的木材。

words.tran_cn: 持续的；持久的；持久不变的
持续性；永续性；能维持性
支持者，维持者；主发动机；支撑的人物
维持（sustain的过去式和过去分词）；承受
维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实

trans.tran_cn: 可持续的，可以忍受的，可支撑的
trans.tran_en: able to continue without causing damage to the environment
